name: Bonheur Royale
description: It's casual and contemporary. BonheurRoyale has the look of a calligraphic hand with a slightly brush feel. The contrast of this and thin strokes gives this clean style a legible quality. It comes with Latin Character sets including Western, Central, and Vietnamese language support. To contribute, see github.com/googlefonts/bonheur-royale .
author: Robert Leuschke
